homepage_title_logged_out: Grow your progress, one ring at a time.
homepage_subtitle: Nenrin helps you work with focus, not frenzy — guiding your day in plain language so you can make steady, lasting progress.
secure_signup_info: Secure signup with your WhatsApp number. No passwords required.
trusted_by: Trusted by teams at leading companies
how_it_works_subtitle: Get started in seconds and see the difference our platform can make for your productivity.
step1_desc: Sign up in seconds with just your phone number.
step2_desc: Simply tell Nenrin what you need to do. Add subtasks...
step3_desc: Ready to collaborate? Just invite others to a project...
pricing_subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your productivity needs. Start free and upgrade as you grow.
plan_pro_desc: Most Popular · For professionals & power users.
all_plans_include: All plans include our core AI productivity features and 24/7 support.
testimonials_subtitle: See what our users have to say about their experience with Nenrin.
testimonial1_content: Nenrin has completely transformed how I manage my daily tasks. The natural language interface makes it feel like I'm talking to a colleague rather than using software.
testimonial2_content: The time tracking and project organization features are incredible. I've increased my productivity by 40% since switching to Nenrin.
testimonial3_content: Our team collaboration has never been smoother. Nenrin makes it easy to keep everyone aligned and on track with our goals.
